title: Linux time Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux time command and learn how to measure the execution time of commands, analyze their performance, and optimize system efficiency.

meta.title: Linux time Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux time command and learn how to measure the execution time of commands, analyze their performance, and optimize system efficiency.
meta.keywords: Linux, time command, command execution time, performance analysis, system monitoring, system management

verify.name: Verify the time command usage
verify.hint: Make sure you can run the `time` command and see the output in your shell history.

verify.name: Verify the time command usage for a script
verify.hint: Make sure you can run the `time` command to measure the execution time of a script and see the output in your shell history.

verify.name: Verify the time command usage for a CPU-bound task
verify.hint: Make sure you can run the `time` command to measure the execution time of a CPU-bound task and see the output in your shell history, including the real, user, and system CPU times.
